messages.content: hi Priya... hope you dont mind me messaging. saw your profile and we seem to have similar interests. i'm not great at these conversations tbh ğŸ˜… but thought i'd give it a try. how's your day going?

Hi Rajesh! Not at all, thank you for reaching out :) I'm not great at this either lol. Had a long day at work actually - spent 4 hours debugging code that turned out to be a missing semicolon ğŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸ How was your day? I see you're also in tech

omg missing semicolon!! ğŸ˜‚ been there done that. actually spent an entire day once because i had a typo in a variable name. felt so dumb afterwards lol. my day was okay, usual meetings and code reviews. can i ask what tech stack you work with? i'm mostly java and spring boot these days

Haha yes the typo struggle is real! I work mostly with Python and Django, some React for frontend. Java intimidates me tbh ğŸ˜… too verbose for my liking. But I respect people who can handle it! Your profile mentioned you like trekking - I've always wanted to try but I'm honestly scared of heights and bugs and basically everything outdoors lol

python is cool! wish i was better at it. and lol about the outdoors fear ğŸ˜„ honestly i only got into trekking because my college friends dragged me. first trek i complained the entire time and swore i'd never do it again. but then... idk something about reaching the top felt good? maybe we could start with something easy like a nature walk if you're ever interested? no pressure though!

A nature walk sounds... manageable ğŸ˜Š I appreciate that you're not judging my indoor lifestyle lol. I saw you're from Pune originally but work in Hyderabad? How do you find it there? I'm from Mumbai and honestly the thought of moving cities for marriage scares me a bit. Is that weird to bring up so early?

not weird at all! these are important things to think about. hyderabad is nice but yeah i miss pune food and my mom's cooking ğŸ˜… moving cities is scary, i totally get it. mumbai is awesome though! been there few times for work. the local trains still confuse me but the vada pav is ğŸ”¥ maybe we're both overthinking this though? we just started talking lol

You're absolutely right, I tend to overthink everything ğŸ˜… My friends always tell me that. Vada pav appreciation is a good sign though! Can I ask something random? What's the weirdest thing about you that people don't usually know? I feel like matrimonial profiles make everyone sound so perfect and boring

haha good question! okay this is embarrassing but... i still sleep with a small teddy bear. had it since i was 5 and somehow never stopped ğŸ™ˆ my roommate makes fun of me but whatever. also i talk to myself when coding, like full conversations. your turn! what's your weird thing?

Aww that's actually sweet about the teddy bear! And talking while coding is totally normal, I do that too ğŸ˜„ My weird thing is I eat ice cream with a fork. Don't ask me why, spoons just feel wrong for ice cream. Also I have conversations with my plants and genuinely believe they respond. My neighbors probably think I'm crazy

ice cream with a FORK?? ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ okay that's genuinely weird but i respect it lol. and plants totally respond! science backs that up... sort of. you seem really nice Priya. i was nervous about messaging because honestly most conversations on these sites are either super formal or super weird. this feels... normal? is that okay to say?

That's totally okay to say! I was thinking the same thing actually. Most guys either send copy-paste messages or get way too personal too fast. This feels like talking to a friend which is nice ğŸ˜Š Can I admit something? I was really nervous about your message and took like 30 mins to reply because I kept rewriting it lol

haha i did the same thing with my first message! wrote it like 5 times ğŸ˜… this whole matrimonial thing is new for me. my parents finally convinced me to try it. would you maybe want to have a phone call sometime? no pressure at all, just thought it might be nice to actually hear each other's voices? we can keep it short if it gets awkward lol
